name: Classic Chicken Soup
description: Homemade chicken soup with tender vegetables and egg noodles.
instructions: In a stock pot, bring chicken and water to a boil, skimming foam.
Add all but 2 cups of carrots and celery, parsnips, onion, parsley sprigs, 2 teaspoons of salt and pepper. Simmer, partially covered, until chicken is cooked, about 1 hour.
Remove chicken to a plate. When cool enough to handle, remove skin and bones, discard. Shred meat and set aside.
Strain broth through cheesecloth-lined sieve into pot (should yield about 5 quarts). Press solids to extract liquid.
Add remaining carrots, remaining celery, and remaining salt. Simmer covered for 5 minutes.
Add noodles, simmer covered for 7 minutes or until carrots are tender and noodles are cooked.
Add chicken and minced parsley. Heat through and serve.
